long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your Browsing with Real-Time Error Reporting and Performance Insights

Errors.net simplifies web browsing by providing friendly error pages and real-time performance errors from broken and slow websites. Our Chrome extension ensures youâ€™re always informed about load times and errors.

Key Features:

User-Friendly Error Pages: Replace standard error messages (404, 500, NX and slow loading pages) with helpful, easy-to-understand pages.

* Instant Load Time Alerts: Receive notifications for slow-loading pages.
* Global Speed Insights: Compare your page load speeds with users in different countries.
* Errors.net focuses on delivering a seamless browsing experience. 

Errors.net is free thanks to our affiliate partnerships.

For more details, view our Terms of Service at https://errors.net/terms/ and Privacy Policy at https://errors.net/privacy-policy/.

Visit errors.net for more information.
